thread.section_title: News24, South Africa's premier news source, provides breaking news on national, world, Africa, sport, entertainment, technology & more.
thread.title: 8 murdered in KZN attack

author: news24.com
title: 8 murdered in KZN attack
text:
Durban - Eight people, including two babies, were murdered in KwaZulu-Natal on Tuesday morning.
News24 understands that four men, two women and two babies were killed in the attack at Mabaleni, near Mtwaluma, just after 02:00.
One person was critically injured.
A baby suffering from Down's Syndrome survived.
